message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $115. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110? That's the lowest I can go.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $110. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $112. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $108? That's the lowest I can go.
